page-description.#text: Return Policy for Rainbow Shops online purchases.

custom-attribute.#text:
Returns are easy!

You can return items purchased in their original, unworn, unused, unopened condition for a full refund of their merchandise value. We accept returns within 30 days of the original ship date.

Please note the following items are final sale and cannot be returned or exchanged:

  • underwear, intimate apparel, lingerie, bras, panties, shapewear
  • bathing suits, swimsuits, bikini tops, bikini bottoms, bikini sets
  • earrings
  • face masks
  • gift cards and all items marked Final Sale.

Original shipping and handling fees are not refundable.

However, in the unlikely event that we have inadvertently sent you incorrect merchandise or you have received damaged merchandise, please notify us immediately by email or telephone. We will reimburse you for the cost of returning the package to us; we will not charge you for the shipping costs of replacement merchandise as long as the item is returned by mail.

Items purchased from a Rainbow Store location cannot be returned to rainbowshops.com.

Refunds for online purchases returned in store will be issued in the original form of payment, except for online purchases made using PayPal. At this time, all store returns of online purchases using PayPal are valid for merchandise credit only.

Online purchases can be returned either to rainbowshops.com or to any of our Rainbow Store locations. To find the store location nearest you, please visit our store locator page.

 

Returns by Mail

You will find a Return form enclosed with your order. To return an item, complete the form and enclose it with the merchandise you are returning. Once we receive your return please allow 5 business days for your return to be processed. We will notify you via email of your refund once we have received and processed the returned item. If the return is approved, a credit will be issued in the original form of payment only. Shipping fees on your original order are not refundable. Please allow a minimum of 1 billing cycle for your refund to appear on your credit card statement.

For your convenience, we include a return label in your package. If you choose to use our return label a fee of $6.95 will be deducted from your return credit when we process your return. However, in the unlikely event that we have inadvertently sent you incorrect or damaged merchandise, please notify us immediately by email or telephone, and we will reimburse you for the cost of returning the package to us.

Please follow these instructions for using the return label included with your shipment:

Step 1: Complete the Returns section of the Packing Slip.

Step 2: Place the merchandise and the Packing Slip in the box.

Step 3: Package the return and seal securely with tape.

Step 4: Affix the Return Label to your package (Note: Make sure to cover or remove the original shipping label)

Step 5: Drop your package at any U.S Post Office location, or with your local postal carrier.

OR

You may also choose to return your package via an alternate method of your choice. If so, please label your package clearly, and send it via a prepaid, insured, traceable method.

Address the package to:
rainbowshops.com
2951 Grant Ave
Philadelphia, PA 19114

If you need further assistance with returns or have additional questions please do not hesitate to contact us at 1-844-5RAINBOW (1-844-572-4626) Monday - Friday from 8:30 am to 8:00 pm ET and Saturday - Sunday from 10:00 am to 6:00 pm ET.

 

Returns to a Rainbow Store

We gladly accept returns to any of our 1,000+ Rainbow Stores. Please visit our store locator to find the Rainbow store nearest you.

Simply bring the merchandise you wish to return and the packing slip from your order when you visit the store. Please make sure that all original tags are attached to the merchandise. If you do not have all original tags and the packing slip for your order we will be unable to process your return.

Purchases made using PayPal can only be refunded via merchandise credit when returned to a Rainbow Store. We cannot process refunds to your PayPal account from our stores.

All other refunds at stores will be made to the original form of payment.

custom-attribute.#text:
Secure Shopping

Your security is a priority at Rainbow. To provide credit card security and keep your personal information safe, we use Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) technology, the most widely used data encryption coding system for secure ecommerce transactions. All of your information is encrypted (scrambled) prior to being sent over the Internet to our system. To protect your information once we receive it, we place it on systems behind secure firewalls, which are communication-management computers designed to keep information safe and inaccessible to other Internet users. If your browser doesn't accept the SSL technology, transactions will not be permitted.

To confirm that your connection is secure, look for a locked padlock icon or solid key icon at the bottom of your browser window. The letters "https" (rather than "http") located in the URL address window at the top of your browser also indicate that you are using a secure browser.

If at any time you are uncertain about the security of our site you can view our Privacy Policy or call Customer Service at 1-844-5RAINBOW (1-844-572-4626). If you feel more comfortable placing an order by phone please call our Customer Service Department at 1-844-5RAINBOW (1-844-572-4626), and a customer service representative will be happy to help you with your order.

page-description.#text: Rainbow shipping options and rates.

custom-attribute.#text:
Free Shipping

is available on all orders over $50 that ship to an address in the Continental US.
No coupon or promo code needed.

Free Shipping on all orders over $99 that ship to Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico and US Virgin Islands, and US Military Addresses (APO or FPO with AE, AP, AA). No coupon or promo code needed.

Shipping Methods

We also offer Standard, Premium, Expedited and One Day Shipping. Time estimates for delivery can be found by entering your zip code above.

Standard shipping is available to all 50 United States, US Military Addresses (APO or FPO with AE, AP, AA), and US Territories (Puerto Rico, US Virgin Islands).

We do not offer express shipping services outside of the 50 United States.

STANDARD SHIPPING
Cost Delivery Time Total Time*
Continental US $6.95 3-7 days 4-9 days
Alaska and Hawaii $14.95 10-14 days 11-15 days
US Military $14.95 30-45 days 31-47 days
Puerto Rico $14.95 10-14 days 11-15 days
US Virgin Islands $14.95 10-22 days 11-25 days
 
PREMIUM SHIPPING
Cost Delivery Time Total Time*
Continental US $9.95 1-5 days 2-7 days
 
EXPEDITED SHIPPING
Cost Delivery Time Total Time*
Continental US $19.95 2 days ** 2 days
Alaska and Hawaii $34.95 2 days ** 2 days
 
ONE DAY SHIPPING
Cost Delivery Time Total Time*
Continental US $26.95 1 day ** 1 day **

Shipping estimates based on business days

*1-2 days processing time included in total time.

**Expedited and One Day Orders placed by 12 Noon Eastern Time (ET), Monday through Friday, excluding holidays. Orders placed after 12 Noon ET will be processed the following business day.

Delivery Days

Standard delivery operates Monday - Saturday. Expedited and One Day delivery operates Monday - Friday.

Order Confirmation Email

Immediately after you have placed your order with Rainbow, you will receive an email that contains your order details. The order confirmation email is your receipt and can be printed for your records. It contains your order number, the items you ordered and prices paid, your ship-to and bill-to addresses, and the method of shipping.
